channel.title: Epic RuneScape bugs
channel.description:
Well, as you all know the other day Jagex released the rest option and more. Along with these updates they introduced some bugs, I witnessed these bugs. I was also on the rants section of the RuneScape forums and so many people where complaining and saying they're quitting etc.
Some of the bugs I witnessed:
1. Can't use the Grand Exchange. 2. Couldn't talk to many npcs. 3. Cannon didn't fire/rotate. 4. When you fmed, it didn't move you to the next space. You had to do this manually. 5. Chins didn't hit more than one target. 6. Long range didn't work. 7. Ancients was messed up. 8. Npcs didn't fight back. 9. Couldn't use many objects. 10. Couldn't access your bank account via booth. 11. Doors in your POH disappeared. 12. Some doors didn't open. 13. Couldn't summon any npcs. 14. Avas device couldn't pick up any arrows. 15. Gmaul spec didn't work.
After about an hour of the update being released, Jafex fixed most of these bugs. They're still fixing some of them last update was about 5 mins ago.
-Jayden

item.title: Epic RuneScape bugs
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:11, topic:283251”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=374297.msg2822611#msg2822611 date=1244719944]
Dev blog from Andrew; here

Also, you could bank using the ‘quick-bank’ option, and only aggressive npcs didn’t fight back.
[/quote]

Dust devils weren’t fighting back, and they aren’t aggressive towards me.[/quote]

That’s weird, I attacked a man when it was all happening, and it attacked me back, so I thought it was just aggressive ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Epic RuneScape bugs
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:283251”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=374297.msg2823310#msg2823310 date=1244779148]

Looks like their preparation for Mechscape is hurting them more than helping them.

Yep, I heard rumors that rs is going to become like rsc, like they’re gonna stop developing rs and move on to their main project, Mechscape.
[/quote]
They’ve already answered that question, its a no because there will be 2 different teams working on 2 different games.[/quote]

Ahh, I see.

Thanks for that

Read full topic

item.title: Epic RuneScape bugs
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Don’t forget the “I can drop my fish and continue to fish” “feature” they said that was added. Claiming it wasn’t a bug.

I modified a rsbot script to abuse this “feature” and got double the xp I did before per hour…till apparently they patched this “feature” sometime last night lol

Read full topic

item.title: Epic RuneScape bugs
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Well, as you all know the other day Jagex released the rest option and more. Along with these updates they introduced some bugs, I witnessed these bugs. I was also on the rants section of the RuneScape forums and so many people where complaining and saying they’re quitting etc.

Some of the bugs I witnessed:

  1. Can’t use the Grand Exchange.
  2. Couldn’t talk to many npcs.
  3. Cannon didn’t fire/rotate.
  4. When you fmed, it didn’t move you to the next space. You had to do this manually.
  5. Chins didn’t hit more than one target.
  6. Long range didn’t work.
  7. Ancients was messed up.
  8. Npcs didn’t fight back.
  9. Couldn’t use many objects.
  10. Couldn’t access your bank account via booth.
  11. Doors in your POH disappeared.
  12. Some doors didn’t open.
  13. Couldn’t summon any npcs.
  14. Avas device couldn’t pick up any arrows.
  15. Gmaul spec didn’t work.

After about an hour of the update being released, Jafex fixed most of these bugs. They’re still fixing some of them last update was about 5 mins ago.

-Jayden
